attributes.action: subsidise british manufacturing to make the British product competitve in the global market, stimulating the economy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A key issue facing british manufacturing is our inability to compete aginst low cost labour markets.  the subsidisation of british manufacturing will ensure a competitive workforce, a competitvly priced product for global markets, and will help retain knowledge, IPR, skills and emplyment in the UK.
